title: NelsonHall Welcomes Michele Loux to its World-Leading HRO Analyst Team
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 8:18 AM   NelsonHall 
BOSTON & LONDON & PARIS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- NelsonHall, the leading global BPS and ITS analyst firm, is delighted to welcome Michele Loux, who joins our HR Outsourcing (HRO) research team as Principal Analyst. She will be jointly responsible for HRO research and client support globally, assisting buy-side clients to make highly informed HRO sourcing decisions, and vendor clients to understand HRO buyer requirements and hone their go-to-market strategies. 
Michele will take responsibility for HRO research in the areas of Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO), Managed Service Program (MSP), and Payroll Outsourcing. 
Michele has over 25 years’ experience in HR consulting, working for leading firms such as Information Services Group (ISG), Watson Wyatt, KPMG Consulting, Price Waterhouse, and Hewitt. Michele has supported clients in the pharmaceutical, healthcare, financial services, manufacturing, retail, government, telecoms and energy industries. Her experience includes service delivery assessment, strategy development, and service provider evaluation & selection for HR services covering workforce administration, payroll, time & attendance, benefits administration, healthcare exchange, absence management, talent acquisition and talent management. 
Michele holds a BSc. in Mathematics from Illinois State University. 
John Willmott, NelsonHall’s CEO, said “Michele is an excellent addition to our world-leading HRO analyst team. She joins practice leader Gary Bragar and Principal Analyst Amy Gurchensky in providing the most comprehensive and insightful coverage of HRO markets in the world. Michele’s extensive HR experience is great news for our clients, as we continue to add the very best expertise to support our clients across every aspect of HRO.” 
About NelsonHall: 
NelsonHall is the leading global BPS and ITS research & analysis firm. Founded in 1998, the company takes a global approach to analysis of vendors and outsourcing markets and is widely respected for the quality and depth of its research. 
NelsonHall also offers a suite of "Speed-to-Source" tools ( NEAT ), that assist buy-side executives in saving time and money, while enhancing the quality of their sourcing decisions, in BPS and ITS evaluations.
